description: Implementing Secure Solutions with Virtual Private Networks (SVPN)

questions.text: Which VPN solution uses TBAR?
questions.correct: A. GETVPN
questions.explanation: TBAR (Time-Based Anti-Replay) is a feature used in GETVPN to provide anti-replay protection without per-packet sequence numbers. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_getvpn/configuration/xe-3s/sec-get-vpn-xe-3s-book/sec-get-vpn.html

questions.text: Which two commands help determine why the NHRP registration process is not being completed even after the IPsec tunnel is up? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: D. show ip nhrp traffic, E. show dmvpn detail
questions.explanation: Since the IPsec tunnel is already up, ISAKMP and IPsec SA commands (A and C) are not needed. 'show ip traffic' (B) is unrelated. 'show ip nhrp traffic' and 'show dmvpn detail' provide insights into NHRP registration issues in DMVPN.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. All internal clients behind the ASA are port address translated to the public outside interface that has an IP address of 3.3.3.3. Client 1 and client 2 have established successful SSL VPN connections to the ASA. What must be implemented so that "3.3.3.3" is returned from a browser search on the IP address?
options: A. Same-security-traffic permit inter-interface under Group Policy
B. Exclude Network List Below under Group Policy
C. Tunnel All Networks under Group Policy
D. Tunnel Network List Below under Group Policy
questions.correct: C. Tunnel All Networks under Group Policy
questions.explanation: The browser resolves to the ASA's public IP (3.3.3.3), so traffic initiates from the ASA. Tunneling all networks ensures VPN clients route everything through the ASA for proper handling.

questions.text: Cisco AnyConnect clients need to transfer large files over the VPN sessions. Which protocol provides the best throughput?
questions.correct: C. DTLS
questions.explanation: DTLS (Datagram Transport Layer Security) uses UDP for better throughput in file transfers compared to TCP-based SSL/TLS, avoiding TCP overhead.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which VPN technology is used in the exhibit?
questions.correct: B. VTI
questions.explanation: The exhibit shows a Virtual Tunnel Interface (VTI) configuration, which simplifies IPsec by treating the tunnel as a routable interface. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_vpnips/configuration/zZ-Archive/IPsec_Virtual_Tunnel_Interface.html#GUID-EB8C433B-2394-42B9-997F-B40803E58A91

questions.text: Which VPN does VPN load balancing on the ASA support?
questions.correct: D. Cisco AnyConnect
questions.explanation: ASA supports VPN load balancing for Cisco AnyConnect SSL VPN sessions, distributing connections across multiple ASAs.

questions.text: Which parameter must match on all routers in a DMVPN Phase 3 cloud?
questions.correct: A. GRE tunnel key
questions.explanation: In DMVPN Phase 3, the GRE tunnel key must match across all routers to ensure proper tunnel establishment and spoke-to-spoke communication.

questions.text: Which parameter is initially used to elect the primary key server from a group of key servers?
questions.correct: C. highest-priority value
questions.explanation: In GETVPN, the primary key server is elected based on the highest configured priority value. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/security/group-encrypted-transport-vpn/deployment_guide_c07_554713.html

questions.text: A Cisco ASA is configured in active/standby mode. What is needed to ensure that Cisco AnyConnect users can connect after a failover event?
options: A. AnyConnect images must be uploaded to both failover ASA devices.
B. The vpnsession-db must be cleared manually.
C. Configure a backup server in the XML profile.
D. AnyConnect client must point to the standby IP address.
questions.correct: A. AnyConnect images must be uploaded to both failover ASA devices.
questions.explanation: For seamless failover, AnyConnect images must be on both ASAs to ensure clients can download updates post-failover. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa90/configuration/guide/asa_90_cli_config/ha_active_standby.html

questions.text: Which benefit of FlexVPN is a limitation of DMVPN using IKEv1?
options: A. GRE encapsulation allows for forwarding of non-IP traffic.
B. IKE implementation can install routes in routing table.
C. NHRP authentication provides enhanced security.
D. Dynamic routing protocols can be configured.
questions.correct: B. IKE implementation can install routes in routing table.
questions.explanation: FlexVPN with IKEv2 allows automatic route installation into the routing table, a feature not available in DMVPN with IKEv1.

questions.text: What is a requirement for smart tunnels to function properly?
options: A. Java or ActiveX must be enabled on the client machine.
C. Stateful failover must not be configured.
D. The user on the client machine must have admin access.
questions.correct: A. Java or ActiveX must be enabled on the client machine.
questions.explanation: Smart tunnels require Java or ActiveX for browser-based application access in clientless SSL VPN. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/asa-5500-x-series-next-generation-firewalls/111007-smart-tunnel-asa-00.html

questions.text: Where is split tunneling defined for IKEv2 remote access clients on a Cisco router?
questions.correct: A. IKEv2 authorization policy
questions.explanation: Split tunneling for IKEv2 is configured in the IKEv2 authorization policy on Cisco routers. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/flexvpn/200555-FlexVPN-AnyConnect-IKEv2-Remote-Access.html

questions.text: Which technology is used to send multicast traffic over a site-to-site VPN?
options: A. GRE over IPsec on IOS router
B. GRE over IPsec on FTD
questions.correct: A. GRE over IPsec on IOS router
questions.explanation: GRE over IPsec on IOS routers supports multicast traffic, as GRE encapsulates multicast packets for IPsec encryption.

questions.text: Which feature of GETVPN is a limitation of DMVPN and FlexVPN?
options: A. sequence numbers that enable scalable replay checking
B. enabled use of ESP or AH
C. design for use over public or private WAN
D. no requirement for an overlay routing protocol
questions.correct: D. no requirement for an overlay routing protocol
questions.explanation: GETVPN does not require an overlay routing protocol like DMVPN or FlexVPN, as it preserves the original IP headers.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Cisco AnyConnect must be set up on a router to allow users to access internal servers 192.168.0.10 and 192.168.0.11. All other traffic should go out of the client's local NIC. Which command accomplishes this configuration?
options: C. svc split include acl CCNP
D. svc split exclude acl CCNP
questions.correct: C. svc split include acl CCNP
questions.explanation: Using 'svc split include acl CCNP' specifies the internal networks to tunnel, allowing other traffic to go locally.

questions.text: Drag and Drop Question Drag and drop the correct commands from the right onto the blanks within the code on the left to implement a design that allow for dynamic spoke-to-spoke communication. Not all commands are used.
questions.explanation: This configuration enables DMVPN Phase 3 for spoke-to-spoke tunnels. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_dmvpn/configuration/xe-16/sec-conn-dmvpn-xe-16-book/sec-conn-dmvpn-summ-maps.html

questions.text: Which two are characteristics of GETVPN? (Choose two.)
options: A. The IP header of the encrypted packet is preserved
B. A key server is elected among all configured Group Members
C. Unique encryption keys are computed for each Group Member
D. The same key encryption and traffic encryption keys are distributed to all Group Members
questions.correct: A. The IP header of the encrypted packet is preserved, D. The same key encryption and traffic encryption keys are distributed to all Group Members
questions.explanation: GETVPN preserves IP headers for routing and uses shared group keys for encryption among members.

questions.text: In FlexVPN, what is the role of a NHRP resolution request?
options: A. It allows these entities to directly communicate without requiring traffic to use an intermediate hop
B. It dynamically assigns VPN users to a group
C. It blocks these entities from to directly communicating with each other
D. It makes sure that each VPN spoke directly communicates with the hub
questions.correct: A. It allows these entities to directly communicate without requiring traffic to use an intermediate hop
questions.explanation: NHRP resolution requests in FlexVPN enable spoke-to-spoke direct communication by resolving peer addresses.

questions.text: A second set of traffic selectors is negotiated between two peers using IKEv2. Which IKEv2 packet will contain details of the exchange?
questions.correct: C. IKEv2 CREATE_CHILD_SA
questions.explanation: Additional traffic selectors in IKEv2 are negotiated in the CREATE_CHILD_SA exchange. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/ipsec-negotiation-ike-protocols/115936-understanding-ikev2-packet-exch-debug.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The DMVPN tunnel is dropping randomly and no tunnel protection is configured. Which spoke configuration mitigates tunnel drops?
questions.correct: C. Option C
questions.explanation: Setting the NHRP hold time to 7200 seconds and registration timeout to 2400 seconds stabilizes the tunnel by aligning with default values. Reference: https://www.globalknowledge.com/us-en/resources/resource-library/articles/understanding-next-hop-resolution-protocol-commands/

questions.text: On a FlexVPN hub-and-spoke topology where spoke-to-spoke tunnels are not allowed, which command is needed for the hub to be able to terminate FlexVPN tunnels?
questions.correct: D. interface virtual-template
questions.explanation: Virtual templates in FlexVPN create virtual access interfaces for spokes, supporting hub termination without spoke-to-spoke tunnels.

questions.text: Which statement about GETVPN is true?
options: A. The configuration that defines which traffic to encrypt originates from the key server.
B. TEK rekeys can be load-balanced between two key servers operating in COOP.
C. The pseudotime that is used for replay checking is synchronized via NTP.
D. Group members must acknowledge all KEK and TEK rekeys, regardless of configuration.
questions.correct: A. The configuration that defines which traffic to encrypt originates from the key server.
questions.explanation: In GETVPN, the key server defines and distributes the encryption policy for group members.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which two tunnel types produce the show crypto ipsec sa output seen in the exhibit? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. DMVPN, E. VTI
questions.explanation: The output indicates DMVPN and VTI tunnels, which use specific SA characteristics for dynamic and virtual interfaces.

questions.text: Which two changes must be made in order to migrate from DMVPN Phase 2 to Phase 3 when EIGRP is configured? (Choose two.)
options: A. Add NHRP shortcuts on the hub.
B. Add NHRP redirects on the spoke.
C. Disable EIGRP next-hop-self on the hub.
D. Enable EIGRP next-hop-self on the hub.
E. Add NHRP redirects on the hub.
questions.correct: D. Enable EIGRP next-hop-self on the hub., E. Add NHRP redirects on the hub.
questions.explanation: Migrating to DMVPN Phase 3 requires enabling next-hop-self and adding NHRP redirects on the hub for spoke-to-spoke routing. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_dmvpn/configuration/15-mt/sec-conn-dmvpn-15-mt-book/sec-conn-dmvpn-dmvpn.html#GUID-BF561439-BCC0-4AAF-80D9-1F7876CB7B81

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A customer cannot establish an IKEv2 site-to-site VPN tunnel between two Cisco ASA devices. Based on the syslog message, which action brings up the VPN tunnel?
options: A. Reduce the maximum SA limit on the local Cisco ASA.
B. Increase the maximum in-negotiation SA limit on the local Cisco ASA.
C. Remove the maximum SA limit on the remote Cisco ASA.
D. Correct the crypto access list on both Cisco ASA devices.
questions.correct: B. Increase the maximum in-negotiation SA limit on the local Cisco ASA.
questions.explanation: The syslog shows the SA limit exceeded, so increasing the in-negotiation SA limit allows more simultaneous negotiations.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which action is demonstrated by this debug output?
options: A. NHRP initial registration by a spoke.
B. NHRP registration acknowledgement by the hub.
C. Disabling of the DMVPN tunnel interface.
questions.correct: A. NHRP initial registration by a spoke.
questions.explanation: The debug shows a spoke sending an NHRP registration request to the hub.

questions.text: Which is used by GETVPN, FlexVPN and DMVPN?
questions.correct: D. ESP
questions.explanation: ESP (Encapsulating Security Payload) provides encryption and authentication in all three technologies.

questions.text: Which IKEv2 feature minimizes the configuration of a FlexVPN on Cisco IOS devices?
questions.correct: D. IKEv2 Smart Defaults
questions.explanation: IKEv2 Smart Defaults simplify FlexVPN configuration by providing predefined settings.

questions.text: Which two parameters help to map a VPN session to a tunnel group without using the tunnel-group list? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. certificate map, D. group-url
questions.explanation: Certificate maps and group URLs allow mapping sessions to tunnel groups without explicit lists.

questions.text: Which method dynamically installs the network routes for remote tunnel endpoints?
questions.correct: C. reverse route injection
questions.explanation: Reverse route injection (RRI) dynamically installs routes for remote endpoints. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_vpnav/configuration/12-4t/sec-vpn-availability-12-4t-book/sec-rev-rte-inject.html

questions.text: Which command identifies a Cisco AnyConnect profile that was uploaded to the flash of an IOS router?
options: A. svc import profile SSL_profile flash:simos-profile.xml
C. crypto vpn anyconnect profile SSL_profile flash:simos-profile.xml
D. webvpn import profile SSL_profile flash:simos-profile.xml
questions.correct: C. crypto vpn anyconnect profile SSL_profile flash:simos-profile.xml
questions.explanation: This command uploads and identifies the AnyConnect profile on the router's flash. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/anyconnect-secure-mobility-client/200533-AnyConnect-Configure-Basic-SSLVPN-for-I.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which value must be configured in the User Group field when the Cisco AnyConnect Profile is created to connect to an ASA headend with IPsec as the primary protocol?
questions.correct: D. tunnel-group
questions.explanation: The User Group in the AnyConnect profile must match the tunnel-group name on the ASA. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/vpn_client/anyconnect/anyconnect41/administration/guide/b_AnyConnect_Administrator_Guide_4-1/configure-vpn.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. What is configured as a result of this command set?
options: A. FlexVPN client profile for IPv6
B. FlexVPN server to authorize groups by using an IPv6 external AAA
C. FlexVPN server for an IPv6 dVTI session
D. FlexVPN server to authenticate IPv6 peers by using EAP
questions.correct: C. FlexVPN server for an IPv6 dVTI session
questions.explanation: The commands configure a FlexVPN server with IPv6 dVTI support.

questions.text: Which two types of web resources or protocols are enabled by default on the Cisco ASA Clientless SSL VPN portal? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: A. HTTP, E. CIFS
questions.explanation: By default, HTTP and CIFS are enabled on the ASA clientless portal; others require plugins. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa94/config-guides/cli/vpn/asa-94-vpn-config/webvpn-configure-gateway.html

questions.text: Which configuration construct must be used in a FlexVPN tunnel?
questions.correct: D. IKEv2 profile
questions.explanation: FlexVPN requires IKEv2 profiles for tunnel negotiation.

questions.text: A Cisco AnyConnect client establishes a SSL VPN connection with an ASA at the corporate office. An engineer must ensure that the client computer meets the enterprise security policy. Which feature can update the client to meet an enterprise security policy?
questions.correct: D. Advanced Endpoint Assessment
questions.explanation: Advanced Endpoint Assessment checks and remediates client compliance with security policies. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/vpn_client/anyconnect/anyconnect46/administration/guide/b_AnyConnect_Administrator_Guide_4-6/configure-posture.html#ID-1407-0000004e

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The customer can establish an AnyConnect connection on the first attempt only. Subsequent attempts fail. What might be the issue?
options: A. IKEv2 is blocked over the path.
B. UserGroup must be different than the name of the connection profile.
C. The primary protocol should be SSL.
D. UserGroup must be the same as the name of the connection profile.
questions.correct: D. UserGroup must be the same as the name of the connection profile.
questions.explanation: The UserGroup in the XML profile must match the connection profile name for consistent connections.

questions.text: Regarding licensing, which option will allow IKEv2 connections on the adaptive security appliance?
options: A. AnyConnect Essentials can be used for Cisco AnyConnect IKEv2 connections.
B. IKEv2 sessions are not licensed.
C. The Advanced Endpoint Assessment license must be installed to allow Cisco AnyConnect IKEv2 sessions.
D. Cisco AnyConnect Mobile must be installed to allow AnyConnect IKEv2 sessions.
questions.correct: A. AnyConnect Essentials can be used for Cisco AnyConnect IKEv2 connections.
questions.explanation: AnyConnect Essentials license supports IKEv2 connections on ASA.

questions.text: What action does the hub take when it receives a NHRP resolution request from a spoke for a network that exists behind another spoke?
options: A. The hub sends back a resolution reply to the requesting spoke.
B. The hub updates its own NHRP mapping.
C. The hub forwards the request to the destination spoke.
D. The hub waits for the second spoke to send a request so that it can respond to both spokes.
questions.correct: C. The hub forwards the request to the destination spoke.
questions.explanation: In DMVPN, the hub forwards NHRP resolution requests to enable spoke-to-spoke tunnels.

questions.text: Which two features provide headend resiliency for Cisco AnyConnect clients? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: C. AnyConnect Backup Servers, D. ASA failover
questions.explanation: Backup servers and ASA failover provide resiliency by allowing clients to connect to alternate headends.

questions.text: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client has been configured to use IKEv2 for one group of users and SSL for another group. When the administrator configures a new AnyConnect release on the Cisco ASA, the IKEv2 users cannot download it automatically when they connect. What might be the problem?
options: A. The XML profile is not configured correctly for the affected users.
B. The new client image does not use the same major release as the current one.
C. Client services are not enabled.
D. Client software updates are not supported with IKEv2.
questions.correct: C. Client services are not enabled.
questions.explanation: Client services must be enabled on the ASA for automatic AnyConnect updates over IKEv2.

questions.text: Under which section must a bookmark or URL list be configured on a Cisco ASA to be available for clientless SSLVPN users?
questions.correct: C. webvpn (group-policy)
questions.explanation: Bookmarks are configured under the webvpn submode of the group policy.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Based on the exhibit, why are users unable to access CCNP Webserver bookmark?
options: A. The URL is being blocked by a WebACL.
B. The ASA cannot resolve the URL.
C. The bookmark has been disabled.
D. The user cannot access the URL.
questions.correct: B. The ASA cannot resolve the URL.
questions.explanation: Grayed-out bookmarks often result from DNS resolution failure; ensure ASA can resolve the URL. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/webvpn-ssl-vpn/119417-config-asa-00.html#anc15

questions.text: Which two statements about the Cisco ASA Clientless SSL VPN solution are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. When a client connects to the Cisco ASA WebVPN portal and tries to access HTTP resources through the URL bar, the client uses the local DNS to perform FQDN resolution.
B. The rewriter enable command under the global webvpn configuration enables the rewriter functionality because that feature is disabled by default.
C. A Cisco ASA can simultaneously allow Clientless SSL VPN sessions and AnyConnect client sessions.
D. When a client connects to the Cisco ASA WebVPN portal and tries to access HTTP resources through the URL bar, the ASA uses its configured DNS servers to perform FQDN resolution.
E. Clientless SSLVPN provides Layer 3 connectivity into the secured network.
questions.correct: C. A Cisco ASA can simultaneously allow Clientless SSL VPN sessions and AnyConnect client sessions., D. When a client connects to the Cisco ASA WebVPN portal and tries to access HTTP resources through the URL bar, the ASA uses its configured DNS servers to perform FQDN resolution.
questions.explanation: ASA supports concurrent clientless and AnyConnect sessions, and uses its DNS for portal resolutions.

questions.text: Which feature allows the ASA to handle nonstandard applications and web resources so that they display correctly over a clientless SSL VPN connection?
questions.correct: B. Smart Tunnel
questions.explanation: Smart Tunnel proxies nonstandard apps for correct display in clientless VPN. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa90/configuration/guide/asa_90_cli_config/vpn_clientless_ssl.html#29951

questions.text: Which command automatically initiates a smart tunnel when a user logs in to the WebVPN portal page?
questions.correct: C. auto-start
questions.explanation: 'auto-start' initiates smart tunnels upon login. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa91/configuration/vpn/asa_91_vpn_config/webvpn-configure-policy-group.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The customer must launch Cisco AnyConnect in the RDP machine. Which IOS configuration accomplishes this task?
questions.correct: C. Option C
questions.explanation: The configuration in C enables AnyConnect launch over RDP. Reference: https://community.cisco.com/t5/vpn/starting-anyconnect-vpn-through-rdp-session-on-cisco-891/td-p/2128284

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which two commands under the tunnel-group webvpn-attributes result in a Cisco AnyConnect user receiving the AnyConnect prompt in the exhibit? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: C. authentication aaa, E. group-alias General enable
questions.explanation: AAA authentication and group-alias enable the prompt for the specified group.

questions.text: Which two statements are true when designing a SSL VPN solution using Cisco AnyConnect? (Choose two.)
options: A. The VPN server must have a self-signed certificate.
B. A SSL group pre-shared key must be configured on the server.
C. Server side certificate is optional if using AAA for client authentication.
D. The VPN IP address pool can overlap with the rest of the LAN networks.
E. DTLS can be enabled for better performance.
questions.correct: D. The VPN IP address pool can overlap with the rest of the LAN networks., E. DTLS can be enabled for better performance.
questions.explanation: Overlapping pools are allowed if properly managed, and DTLS improves performance over TLS.

questions.text: An engineer is configuring IPsec VPN and wants to choose an authentication protocol that is reliable and supports ACK and sequence. Which protocol accomplishes this goal?
questions.correct: C. ESP
questions.explanation: ESP provides reliable authentication with ACK and sequencing for IPsec.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. What is the problem with the IKEv2 site-to-site VPN tunnel?
questions.correct: B. crypto access list mismatch
questions.explanation: The debug shows an access list mismatch preventing the tunnel from passing traffic.

questions.text: Which requirement is needed to use local authentication for Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Clients that connect to a FlexVPN server?
options: A. use of certificates instead of username and password
questions.correct: D. AnyConnect profile
questions.explanation: Local authentication requires an AnyConnect profile for FlexVPN clients. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/flexvpn/200555-FlexVPN-AnyConnect-IKEv2-Remote-Access.html

questions.text: Which IKE identity does an IOS/IOS-XE headend expect to receive if an IPsec Cisco AnyConnect client uses default settings?
questions.correct: B. *$AnyConnectClient$*
questions.explanation: Default IKE identity for AnyConnect IPsec is *$AnyConnectClient$*. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/flexvpn/200555-FlexVPN-AnyConnect-IKEv2-Remote-Access.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of VPN is allowed for users connecting to the Employee tunnel group?
questions.correct: D. clientless
questions.explanation: The default group policy DfltGrpPolicy for the Employee tunnel group permits only clientless SSL VPN.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is troubleshooting a new GRE over IPsec tunnel. The tunnel is established but the engineer cannot ping from spoke 1 to spoke 2. Which type of traffic is being blocked?
options: A. ESP packets from spoke2 to spoke1
B. ISAKMP packets from spoke2 to spoke1
C. ESP packets from spoke1 to spoke2
D. ISAKMP packets from spoke1 to spoke2
questions.correct: A. ESP packets from spoke2 to spoke1
questions.explanation: The exhibit indicates ESP return traffic from spoke2 to spoke1 is blocked.

questions.text: Which command is used to troubleshoot an IPv6 FlexVPN spoke-to-hub connectivity failure?
questions.correct: A. show crypto ikev2 sa
questions.explanation: For IPv6 FlexVPN, 'show crypto ikev2 sa' checks IKEv2 SA status. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/flexvpn/116413-configure-flexvpn-00.pdf

questions.text: In a FlexVPN deployment, the spokes successfully connect to the hub, but spoke-to-spoke tunnels do not form. Which troubleshooting step solves the issue?
options: A. Verify the spoke configuration to check if the NHRP redirect is enabled.
B. Verify that the spoke receives redirect messages and sends resolution requests.
C. Verify the hub configuration to check if the NHRP shortcut is enabled.
D. Verify that the tunnel interface is contained within a VRF.
questions.correct: B. Verify that the spoke receives redirect messages and sends resolution requests.
questions.explanation: Spokes must receive redirects and send resolutions for spoke-to-spoke tunnels in FlexVPN. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_dmvpn/configuration/15-mt/sec-conn-dmvpn-15-mt-book/sec-conn-dmvpn-summ-maps.pdf

questions.text: An engineer is troubleshooting a new DMVPN setup on a Cisco IOS router. After the show crypto isakmp sa command is issued, a response is returned of "MM_NO_STATE." Why does this failure occur?
options: A. The ISAKMP policy priority values are invalid.
B. ESP traffic is being dropped.
C. The Phase 1 policy does not match on both devices.
D. Tunnel protection is not applied to the DMVPN tunnel.
questions.correct: C. The Phase 1 policy does not match on both devices.
questions.explanation: MM_NO_STATE indicates a Phase 1 policy mismatch in ISAKMP. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/dynamic-multipoint-vpn-dmvpn/111976-dmvpn-troubleshoot-00.html

questions.text: What are two variables for configuring clientless SSL VPN single sign-on? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. CSCO_WEBVPN_INTERNAL_PASSWORD, C. CSCO_WEBVPN_USERNAME
questions.explanation: These variables pass username and internal password for SSO in clientless SSL VPN.

questions.text: Drag and Drop Question Drag and drop the GETVPN components from the left onto the descriptions on the right.
questions.explanation: These are the key components and their roles in GETVPN.

definitions.text: Registers with the key server to get the respective policy and keys
Authenticates the individual GMs that are participating in the group
Defines the policy attributes that are distributed to the GM
Encrypts or decrypts the data traffic
Assists in creating the registration policy and TEK

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The customer can establish a Cisco AnyConnect connection without using an XML profile. When the host "ikev2" is selected in the AnyConnect drop down, the connection fails. What is the cause of this issue?
options: B. The IP address is incorrect.
C. Primary protocol should be SSL.
D. UserGroup must match connection profile.
questions.correct: D. UserGroup must match connection profile.
questions.explanation: The UserGroup must match the connection profile for IKEv2 selection. Reference: https://community.cisco.com/t5/security-documents/anyconnect-xml-settings/ta-p/3157891

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A site-to-site tunnel between two sites is not coming up. Based on the debugs, what is the cause of this issue?
options: A. An authentication failure occurs on the remote peer.
B. A certificate fragmentation issue occurs between both sides.
C. UDP 4500 traffic from the peer does not reach the router.
D. An authentication failure occurs on the router.
questions.correct: C. UDP 4500 traffic from the peer does not reach the router.
questions.explanation: The debug indicates NAT-T (UDP 4500) traffic is blocked, preventing tunnel establishment.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Based on the debug output, which type of mismatch is preventing the VPN from coming up?
questions.correct: A. interesting traffic
questions.explanation: TS unacceptable indicates a policy mismatch in traffic selectors (interesting traffic).

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The IKEv2 site-to-site VPN tunnel between two routers is down. Based on the debug output, which type of mismatch is the problem?
questions.correct: B. peer identity
questions.explanation: The debug shows a peer identity mismatch causing the tunnel failure.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of mismatch is causing the problem with the IPsec VPN tunnel?
questions.correct: D. preshared key
questions.explanation: The debug indicates a preshared key mismatch. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/ipsec-negotiation-ike-protocols/5409-ipsec-debug-00.html#ike

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. What is a result of this configuration?
options: A. Spoke 1 fails the authentication because the authentication methods are incorrect.
B. Spoke 2 passes the authentication to the hub and successfully proceeds to phase 2.
C. Spoke 2 fails the authentication because the remote authentication method is incorrect.
D. Spoke 1 passes the authentication to the hub and successfully proceeds to phase 2.
questions.correct: A. Spoke 1 fails the authentication because the authentication methods are incorrect.
questions.explanation: Authentication methods must match; hub local must match spoke remote.

questions.text: Which two cryptographic technologies are recommended for use with FlexVPN? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: A. SHA (HMAC variant), B. Diffie-Hellman
questions.explanation: SHA-HMAC and Diffie-Hellman are recommended for secure key exchange in FlexVPN.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An administrator had the above configuration working with SSL protocol, but as soon as the administrator specified IPsec as the primary protocol, the Cisco AnyConnect client was not able to connect. What is the problem?
options: A. IPsec will not work in conjunction with a group URL.
B. The Cisco AnyConnect implementation does not allow the two group URLs to be the same. SSL does allow this.
C. If you specify the primary protocol as IPsec, the User Group must be the exact name of the connection profile (tunnel group).
D. A new XML profile should be created instead of modifying the existing profile, so that the clients force the update.
questions.correct: C. If you specify the primary protocol as IPsec, the User Group must be the exact name of the connection profile (tunnel group).
questions.explanation: For IPsec primary, User Group must match the tunnel group name.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Client 1 cannot communicate with client 2. Both clients are using Cisco AnyConnect and have established a successful SSL VPN connection to the hub ASA. Which command on the ASA is missing?
questions.correct: B. same-security-traffic permit intra-interface
questions.explanation: Intra-interface traffic permit allows VPN client communication on the same interface.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An SSL client is connecting to an ASA headend. The session fails with the message "Connection attempt has timed out. Please verify Internet connectivity." Based on how the packet is processed, which phase is causing the failure?
questions.correct: D. phase 3: UN-NAT
questions.explanation: Failure at UN-NAT phase indicates NAT reversal issue preventing connection.

questions.text: Which redundancy protocol must be implemented for IPsec stateless failover to work?
questions.correct: C. HSRP
questions.explanation: HSRP is required for IPsec stateless failover. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/ipsec-negotiation-ike-protocols/17826-ipsec-feat.html

questions.text: Which technology works with IPsec stateful failover?
questions.correct: B. HSRP
questions.explanation: HSRP supports IPsec stateful failover. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios/12_2/12_2y/12_2yx11/feature/guide/ft_vpnha.html#wp1122512

questions.text: What are two functions of ECDH and ECDSA? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: C. digital signature, D. key exchange
questions.explanation: ECDH for key exchange, ECDSA for digital signatures. Reference: https://tools.cisco.com/security/center/resources/next_generation_cryptography

questions.text: What uses an Elliptic Curve key exchange algorithm?
questions.correct: B. ECDHE
questions.explanation: ECDHE uses Elliptic Curve for Diffie-Hellman key exchange. Reference: https://blog.cloudflare.com/a-relatively-easy-to-understand-primer-on-elliptic-curve-cryptography/

questions.text: Which two remote access VPN solutions support SSL? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. clientless, E. Cisco AnyConnect
questions.explanation: Clientless SSL VPN and AnyConnect support SSL.

questions.text: An engineer has integrated a new DMVPN to link remote offices across the internet using Cisco IOS routers. When connecting to remote sites, pings and voice data appear to flow properly, and all tunnel stats show that they are up. However, when trying to connect to a remote server using RDP, the connection fails. Which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Adjust the MTU size within the routers.
B. Add RDP port to the extended ACL.
C. Replace certificate on the RDP server.
questions.correct: A. Adjust the MTU size within the routers.
questions.explanation: RDP failure often due to MTU issues in DMVPN; adjusting MTU resolves fragmentation.

questions.text: An engineer has integrated a new DMVPN to link remote offices across the internet using Cisco IOS routers. When connecting to remote sites, pings and voice data appear to flow properly, and all tunnel stats show that they are up. However, when trying to connect to a remote server using RDP, the connection fails. Which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Adjust the MTU size within the routers.
B. Add RDP port to the extended ACL.
C. Replace certificate on the RDP server.
questions.correct: A. Adjust the MTU size within the routers.
questions.explanation: MTU adjustment prevents fragmentation for RDP over DMVPN.

questions.text: Where must an engineer configure a preshared key for a site-to-site VPN tunnel configured on a Cisco ASA?
questions.correct: D. tunnel group
questions.explanation: Preshared keys are configured under the tunnel group on ASA.

questions.text: A company's remote locations connect to the data centers via MPLS. A new request requires that unicast and multicast traffic that exits in the remote locations be encrypted. Which non-tunneled technology should be used to satisfy this requirement?
questions.correct: D. GETVPN
questions.explanation: GETVPN provides non-tunneled encryption for unicast/multicast over MPLS.

questions.text: A network engineer must design a remote access solution to allow contractors to access internal servers. These contractors do not have permissions to install applications on their computers. Which VPN solution should be used in this design?
questions.correct: B. Clientless
questions.explanation: Clientless VPN allows access without installing software.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of Cisco VPN is shown for group Cisc012345678?
questions.correct: A. Cisco AnyConnect Client VPN
questions.explanation: The exhibit shows AnyConnect client VPN for the group.

questions.text: Which command shows the smart default configuration for an IPsec profile?
options: A. show run all crypto ipsec profile
B. ipsec profile does not have any smart default configuration
D. show crypto ipsec profile default
questions.correct: D. show crypto ipsec profile default
questions.explanation: This command displays IKEv2 smart defaults for IPsec profiles.

questions.text: Drag and Drop Question Drag and drop the code snippets from the right onto the blanks in the configuration to implement FlexVPN. Not all snippets are used.
questions.explanation: This configures FlexVPN with PSK authentication.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The DMVPN spoke is not establishing a session with the hub. Which two actions resolve this issue? (Choose two.)
options: A. Change the spoke nhs to 172.16.18.1 and the nbma to 10.0.0.1.
B. Change the transform set to mode tunnel.
C. Change the ISAKMP policy authentication on the spoke to pre-shared.
D. Change the ISAKMP key address on the spoke to 0.0.0.0.
E. Change the nhrp authentication key on the spoke to cisco123.
questions.correct: C. Change the ISAKMP policy authentication on the spoke to pre-shared., E. Change the nhrp authentication key on the spoke to cisco123.
questions.explanation: Matching ISAKMP authentication and NHRP key resolves the session issue.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer is configuring remote access SSLVPN and is unable to complete the connection using local credentials. What must be done to remediate this problem?
options: A. Enable the client protocol in the Cisco AnyConnect profile.
B. Configure a AAA server group to authenticate the client.
C. Change the authentication method to local.
D. Configure the group policy to force local authentication.
questions.correct: A. Enable the client protocol in the Cisco AnyConnect profile.
questions.explanation: Enabling the protocol in the profile allows local credential use.

questions.text: Which two NHRP functions are specific to DMVPN Phase 3 implementation? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. redirect, C. resolution reply
questions.explanation: Redirect and resolution reply are Phase 3 specific for spoke-to-spoke.

questions.text: A network engineer must implement an SSLVPN Cisco AnyConnect solution that supports 500 concurrent users, ensures all traffic from the client passes through the ASA, and allows users to access all devices on the inside interface subnet (192.168.0.0/24). Assuming all other configuration is set up appropriately, which configuration implements this solution?
questions.correct: A. Option A
questions.explanation: Tunnel all with a /24 pool supports 500 users (254 IPs insufficient).

questions.text: Which two features are valid backup options for an IOS FlexVPN client? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. DNS-based hub resolution, C. reactivate primary peer
questions.explanation: These provide backup for FlexVPN clients. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_ike2vpn/configuration/15-2mt/sec-cfg-flex-clnt.html#GUID-CA7D6429-5F13-4CB9-BE2E-EDFCFB3792B3

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of VPN is used?
questions.correct: C. Cisco Easy VPN
questions.explanation: The exhibit shows Easy VPN configuration. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa97/configuration/vpn/asa-97-vpn-config/vpn-easyvpn.html

questions.text: An engineer would like Cisco AnyConnect users to be able to reach servers within the 10.10.0.0/16 subnet while all other traffic is sent out to the Internet. Which IPsec configuration accomplishes this task?
questions.correct: B. Option B
questions.explanation: Split tunnel with 10.10.0.0/16 included routes internal traffic via VPN.

questions.text: Which Cisco AnyConnect component ensures that devices in a specific internal subnet are only accessible using port 443?
questions.correct: D. VPN filter
questions.explanation: VPN filter restricts access to port 443 for the subnet.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Upon setting up a tunnel between two sites, users are complaining that connections to applications over the VPN are not working consistently. The output of show crypto ipsec sa was collected on one of the VPN devices. Based on this output, what should be done to fix this issue?
options: C. Specify the application networks in the remote identity.
D. Make an adjustment to IPSec replay window.
questions.correct: D. Make an adjustment to IPSec replay window.
questions.explanation: Replay errors indicate need to adjust the replay window size. Reference: https://community.cisco.com/t5/vpn/ipsec-anti-replay-errors-on-1-gig-vpn-tunnel/td-p/4524103

questions.text: After a user configures a connection profile with a bookmark list and tests the clientless SSLVPN connection, all of the bookmarks are grayed out. What must be done to correct this behavior?
options: A. Apply the bookmark to the correct group policy.
B. Specify the correct port for the web server under the bookmark.
C. Configure a DNS server on the Cisco ASA and verify it has a record for the web server.
D. Verify HTTP/HTTPS connectivity between the Cisco ASA and the web server.
questions.correct: C. Configure a DNS server on the Cisco ASA and verify it has a record for the web server.
questions.explanation: Grayed bookmarks often due to DNS resolution failure on ASA.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of VPN implementation is displayed?
options: A. GET VPN with COOP key server
B. GET VPN with dual group member
questions.correct: A. GET VPN with COOP key server
questions.explanation: The exhibit shows GETVPN with cooperative key servers.

questions.text: An administrator is designing a VPN with a partner's non-Cisco VPN solution. The partner's VPN device will negotiate an IKEv2 tunnel that will only encrypt subnets 192.168.0.0/24 going to 10.0.0.0/24. Which technology must be used to meet these requirements?
questions.correct: B. crypto map
questions.explanation: Crypto maps allow specific subnet encryption with non-Cisco peers.

questions.text: A company's remote locations connect to the data centers via MPLS. A new request requires that unicast and multicast traffic that exits in the remote locations be encrypted. Which non-tunneled technology should be used to satisfy this requirement?
questions.correct: D. GETVPN
questions.explanation: GETVPN encrypts unicast/multicast without tunnels over MPLS.

questions.text: While troubleshooting, an engineer finds that the show crypto isakmp sa command indicates that the last state of the tunnel is MM_KEY_EXCH. What is the next step that should be taken to resolve this issue?
options: A. Verify that the ISAKMP proposals match.
B. Ensure that UDP 500 is not being blocked between the devices.
C. Correct the peer's IP address on the crypto map.
D. Confirm that the pre-shared keys match on both devices.
questions.correct: D. Confirm that the pre-shared keys match on both devices.
questions.explanation: MM_KEY_EXCH state often due to PSK mismatch.

questions.text: Which VPN technology must be used to ensure that routers are able to dynamically form connections with each other rather than sending traffic through a hub and be able to advertise routes without the use of a dynamic routing protocol?
questions.correct: D. GETVPN
questions.explanation: GETVPN allows dynamic connections without hub or routing protocol.

questions.text: An administrator is setting up AnyConnect for the first time for a few users. Currently, the router does not have access to a RADIUS server. Which AnyConnect protocol must be used to allow users to authenticate?
questions.correct: D. EAP-AnyConnect
questions.explanation: EAP-AnyConnect allows local authentication without RADIUS.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. DMVPN spoke-to-spoke traffic works, but it passes through the hub, and never sends direct spoke-to-spoke traffic. Based on the tunnel interface configuration shown, what must be configured on the hub to solve the issue?
questions.correct: A. Enable NHRP redirect.
questions.explanation: NHRP redirect on hub enables direct spoke-to-spoke tunnels.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A user is connecting from behind a PC with a private IP Address. Their ISP provider is blocking TCP port 443. Which AnyConnect XML configuration will allow the user to establish a connection with the ASA?
questions.correct: B. Option B
questions.explanation: Enabling DTLS fallback allows connection over UDP when TCP 443 is blocked.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which two conclusions should be drawn from the DMVPN phase 2 configuration? (Choose two.)
options: B. EIGRP neighbor adjacency will fail.
C. EIGRP is used as the dynamic routing protocol.
D. EIGRP route redistribution is not allowed.
questions.correct: C. EIGRP is used as the dynamic routing protocol., E. Spoke-to-spoke communication is allowed.
questions.explanation: Phase 2 uses EIGRP and allows spoke-to-spoke via hub.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The VPN tunnel between the FlexVPN spoke and FlexVPN hub 192.168.0.12 is failing. What should be done to correct this issue?
options: A. Add the address 192.168.0.12 255.255.255.255 command to the keyring configuration.
B. Add the match fvrf any command to the IKEv2 policy.
C. Add the aaa authorization group psk list Flex_AAA Flex_Auth command to the IKEv2 profile configuration.
D. Add the tunnel mode gre ip command to the tunnel configuration.
questions.correct: C. Add the aaa authorization group psk list Flex_AAA Flex_Auth command to the IKEv2 profile configuration.
questions.explanation: AAA authorization is needed for PSK in the profile.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An IKEv2 site-to-site tunnel between an ASA and a remote peer is not building successfully. What will fix the problem based on the debug output?
options: A. Ensure crypto IPsec policy matches on both VPN devices.
B. Install the correct certificate to validate the peer.
C. Correct crypto access list on both VPN devices.
D. Specify the peer IP address in the tunnel group name.
questions.correct: A. Ensure crypto IPsec policy matches on both VPN devices.
questions.explanation: Debug shows IPsec policy mismatch.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer is reconfiguring clientless SSLVPN during a maintenance window, and after testing the new configuration, is unable to establish the connection. What must be done to remediate this problem?
options: A. Enable client services on the outside interface.
B. Enable clientless protocol under the group policy.
C. Enable DTLS under the group policy.
D. Enable auto sign-on for the user's IP address.
questions.correct: B. Enable clientless protocol under the group policy.
questions.explanation: Clientless protocol must be enabled in group policy.

questions.text: What are two purposes of the key server in Cisco IOS GETVPN? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. to maintain encryption policies, E. to authenticate group members
questions.explanation: Key server maintains policies and authenticates members.

questions.text: An engineer notices that while an employee is connected remotely, all traffic is being routed to the corporate network. Which split-tunnel policy allows a remote client to use their local provider for Internet access when working from home?
questions.correct: C. tunnelspecified
questions.explanation: Tunnelspecified sends only specified traffic via VPN, allowing local Internet access.

questions.text: In order to enable FlexVPN to use a AAA attribute list, which two tasks must be performed? (Choose two.)
options: B. Verify that clients are using the correct authorization policy.
D. Assign the list to an authorization policy.
E. Set the maximum segment size.
questions.correct: B. Verify that clients are using the correct authorization policy., D. Assign the list to an authorization policy.
questions.explanation: Define and assign AAA attribute list for FlexVPN.

questions.text: Which technology and VPN component allows a VPN headend to dynamically learn post NAT IP addresses of remote routers at different sites?
questions.correct: C. DMVPN with NHRP
questions.explanation: NHRP in DMVPN learns post-NAT addresses.

questions.text: An engineer must configure remote desktop connectivity for offsite admins via clientless SSL VPN, configured on a Cisco ASA to Windows Vista workstations. Which two configurations provide the requested access? (Choose two.)
options: A. Telnet bookmark via the Telnet plugin
B. RDP2 bookmark via the RDP2 plugin
C. VNC bookmark via the VNC plugin
D. Citrix bookmark via the ICA plugin
E. SSH bookmark via the SSH plugin
questions.correct: B. RDP2 bookmark via the RDP2 plugin, C. VNC bookmark via the VNC plugin
questions.explanation: RDP2 and VNC plugins enable remote desktop. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa98/configuration/vpn/asa-98-vpn-config/webvpn-configure-gateway.html

questions.text: A network engineer must design a clientless VPN solution for a company. VPN users must be able to access several internal web servers. When reachability to those web servers was tested, it was found that one website is not being rewritten correctly by the ASA. What is a potential solution for this issue while still allowing it to be a clientless VPN setup?
options: A. Set up a smart tunnel with the IP address of the web server.
B. Set up a NAT rule that translates the ASA public address to the web server private address on port 80.
C. Set up Cisco AnyConnect with a split tunnel that has the IP address of the web server.
D. Set up a WebACL to permit the IP address of the web server.
questions.explanation: NAT rule makes the server reachable in clientless setup.
questions.correct: B. Set up a NAT rule that translates the ASA public address to the web server private address on port 80.

questions.text: Which two types of SSO functionality are available on the Cisco ASA without any external SSO servers? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. NTLM, E. HTTP Basic
questions.explanation: NTLM and HTTP Basic are built-in SSO methods. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa916/configuration/vpn/asa-916-vpn-config/webvpn-configure-policy-groups.html#ID-2439-00001438

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of VPN implementation is displayed?
questions.correct: C. IKEv2 load balancer
questions.explanation: Exhibit shows IKEv2 load balancing. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_ike2vpn/configuration/xe-16-10/sec-flex-vpn-xe-16-10-book/sec-cfg-clb-supp.html

questions.text: A DMVPN spoke router tunnel is up and passing traffic, but it cannot establish an EIGRP neighbor relationship with the hub router. Which solution resolves this issue?
options: A. Enable EIGRP Split Horizon on the hub tunnel interface.
B. Remove the EIGRP stub configuration on the spoke tunnel interface.
C. Enable the EIGRP next hop self feature on the hub tunnel interface.
D. Configure the dynamic NHRP multicast map on the hub tunnel interface.
questions.correct: D. Configure the dynamic NHRP multicast map on the hub tunnel interface.
questions.explanation: Dynamic multicast mapping enables EIGRP over DMVPN.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A TCP based application that should be accessible over the VPN tunnel is not working. Pings to the appropriate IP address are failing. Based on the output, what is a fix for this issue?
options: A. Add a route on the remote peer for 209.165.201.0/27.
B. Add a route on the local peer for 10.1.1.0/24.
C. Add a permit for TCP traffic going to 10.1.1.0/24.
D. Add a permit for TCP traffic going to 209.165.201.0/27.
questions.correct: A. Add a route on the remote peer for 209.165.201.0/27.
questions.explanation: Missing route on remote peer for return traffic.

questions.text: A network engineer has been tasked with configuring SSL VPN to provide remote users with access to the corporate network. Traffic destined to the enterprise IP range should go through the tunnel, and all other traffic should go directly to the Internet. Which feature should be configured to achieve this?
questions.correct: C. split-tunnel
questions.explanation: Split-tunnel routes enterprise traffic via VPN, others locally.

questions.text: A clientless SSLVPN solution is built for 10 employees on a newly installed Cisco ASA. After a couple of days in production, it has been observed that only the first two users to log in each day are able to connect successfully. The remaining users encounter the message "Login failed". Which action resolves the issue?
options: A. Allocate additional Cisco AnyConnect Premium licenses to the ASA.
B. Increase the vpn-simultaneous-logins parameter to a value of more than 2.
C. Increase the number or IP addresses available in the VPN pool.
D. Verify that the users that cannot log in are in the correct AD group with VPN permissions.
questions.correct: A. Allocate additional Cisco AnyConnect Premium licenses to the ASA.
questions.explanation: Clientless VPN requires Premium licenses; default is 2.

questions.text: Which feature must be disabled in EIGRP for DMVPN spokes to learn routes to other DMVPN spokes?
questions.correct: A. split-horizon
questions.explanation: Disabling split-horizon allows spokes to learn routes via hub.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is diagnosing an issue that occurred after a router at a branch site was assigned a new address. Based on the debugs, what must be done to resolve this issue?
options: A. Import the issuing CA for the ASA identity certificate on the user's PC.
B. Enroll and import an SSL certificate with the CN value example.cisco.com on the ASA.
C. Add the CN example.cisco.com to the AnyConnect XML certificate matching section.
D. Enable certificate authentication under the connection profile.
questions.correct: A. Import the issuing CA for the ASA identity certificate on the user's PC.
questions.explanation: Untrusted server due to missing CA trust on client.

questions.text: A network administrator is deploying a Cisco IPS appliance and needs it to operate initially without affecting traffic flows. It must also collect data to provide a baseline of unwanted traffic before being reconfigured to drop it. Which Cisco IPS mode meets these requirements?
questions.correct: C. promiscuous
questions.explanation: Promiscuous mode monitors without affecting traffic.

questions.text: A network engineer has set up a FlexVPN server to terminate multiple FlexVPN clients. The VPN tunnels are established without issue. However, when a Change of Authorization is issued by the RADIUS server, the FlexVPN server does not update the authorization of connected FlexVPN clients. Which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Add the aaa server radius dynamic-author command on the FlexVPN clients.
B. Fix the RADIUS key mismatch between the RADIUS server and FlexVPN server.
C. Add the aaa server radius dynamic-author command on the FlexVPN server.
D. Fix the RADIUS key mismatch between the RADIUS server and FlexVPN clients.
questions.correct: C. Add the aaa server radius dynamic-author command on the FlexVPN server.
questions.explanation: The dynamic-author command enables the FlexVPN server to process Change of Authorization (CoA) requests from the RADIUS server, updating client authorizations. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/sec_conn_ike2vpn/configuration/xe-16-10/sec-flex-vpn-xe-16-10-book/sec-ikev2-flex-coa.html

questions.text: A company needs to ensure only corporate issued laptops and devices are allowed to connect with the Cisco AnyConnect client. The solution should be applicable to multiple operating systems, including Windows, MacOS, and Linux, and should allow for remote remediation if a corporate issued device is stolen. Which solution should be used to accomplish these goals?
options: A. Use a DAP registry check on the system to determine the relationship with the corporate domain.
B. Use a DAP file check on the system to determine the relationship with the corporate domain.
C. Install and authenticate user certificates on the corporate devices.
D. Install and authenticate machine certificates on the corporate devices
questions.correct: A. Use a DAP registry check on the system to determine the relationship with the corporate domain.
questions.explanation: Dynamic Access Policies (DAP) with registry checks can verify domain membership across OS platforms for endpoint assessment. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa98/asdm78/vpn/asdm-78-vpn-config/vpn-asdm-dap.html#ID-2184-00000017

questions.text: When a FlexVPN is configured, which two components must be configured for IKEv2? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. profile, C. proposal
questions.explanation: IKEv2 in FlexVPN requires a profile for peer matching and a proposal for crypto algorithms.

questions.text: A DMVPN spoke router tunnel is up and passing traffic, but it cannot establish an EIGRP neighbor relationship with the hub router. Which solution resolves this issue?
options: A. Enable EIGRP Split Horizon on the hub tunnel interface.
B. Remove the EIGRP stub configuration on the spoke tunnel interface.
C. Enable the EIGRP next hop self feature on the hub tunnel interface.
D. Configure the dynamic NHRP multicast map on the hub tunnel interface.
questions.correct: D. Configure the dynamic NHRP multicast map on the hub tunnel interface.
questions.explanation: Dynamic NHRP multicast mapping allows EIGRP multicasts to reach spokes for neighbor adjacency.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An IPsec Cisco AnyConnect client is failing to connect and generates these debugs every time a connection to an IOS headend is attempted. Which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Correct the DH group setting.
questions.correct: A. Correct the DH group setting.
questions.explanation: The debug indicates a mismatch in the Diffie-Hellman group, preventing SA establishment.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must allow Cisco AnyConnect users to access the outside interface using protocol UDP 500/4500. In addition, these clients must be able to establish an SSL connection to update Cisco AnyConnect software over the same connection. Which two actions must be taken to achieve this goal? (Choose two.)
options: A. IPsec (IKEv2) Allow Access must be checked on the outside interface.
B. SSL Enable DTLS must be checked on the outside interface.
C. Bypass interface access lists for inbound VPN sessions must be checked.
D. IPsec (IKEv2) Enable Client Services must be checked on the outside interface.
E. SSL Allow Access must be checked on the outside interface.
questions.correct: A. IPsec (IKEv2) Allow Access must be checked on the outside interface., D. IPsec (IKEv2) Enable Client Services must be checked on the outside interface.
questions.explanation: IKEv2 access allows UDP 500/4500, and client services enable SSL for software updates. AnyConnect uses IKE for tunnel and SSL for updates.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Based on the configuration output, what is the VPN technology?
questions.correct: C. L2VPN
questions.explanation: The configuration suggests L2VPN based on the output.

questions.text: A user at a company HQ is having trouble accessing a network share at a branch site that is connected with a L2L IPsec VPN. While troubleshooting, a network security engineer runs a packet tracer on the Cisco ASA to simulate the user traffic and discovers that the encryption counter is increasing but the decryption counter is not. What must be configured to fix this issue?
options: A. Adjust the routing on the remote peer device to direct traffic back over the tunnel.
B. Adjust the preshared key on the remote peer to allow traffic to flow over the tunnel.
C. Adjust the transform set to allow bidirectional traffic.
D. Adjust the peer IP address on the remote peer to direct traffic back to the ASA.
questions.correct: A. Adjust the routing on the remote peer device to direct traffic back over the tunnel.
questions.explanation: Encryption increases but decryption doesn't indicate asymmetric routing; adjust remote routing for return traffic.

questions.text: A user is experiencing delays on audio calls over a Cisco AnyConnect VPN. Which implementation step resolves this issue?
options: B. Shorten the encryption key lifetime.
C. Install the Cisco AnyConnect 2.3 client for the user to download.
questions.correct: D. Enable DTLS.
questions.explanation: DTLS uses UDP for better real-time audio performance over VPN.

questions.text: Users cannot log in to a Cisco ASA using clientless SSLVPN. Troubleshooting reveals the error message "WebVPN session terminated: Client type not supported". Which step does the administrator take to resolve this issue?
options: A. Enable the clientless VPN protocol on the group policy.
B. Have the user upgrade to a supported browser.
C. Increase the simultaneous logins allowed on the group policy.
D. Verify that a user account exists in the local AAA database for the user.
questions.correct: A. Enable the clientless VPN protocol on the group policy.
questions.explanation: The error indicates clientless protocol not enabled; enable it in group policy. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/webvpn-ssl-vpn/119417-config-asa-00.html#anc15

questions.text: An administrator must guarantee that remote access users are able to reach printers on their local LAN after a VPN session is established to the headquarters. All other traffic should be sent over the tunnel. Which split-tunnel policy reduces the configuration on the ASA headend?
questions.correct: B. exclude specified
questions.explanation: Exclude specified excludes local LAN from tunnel, sending all else over VPN, minimizing config.

questions.text: An administrator is planning a VPN configuration that will encrypt traffic between multiple servers that will be passing unicast and multicast traffic. This configuration must be able to be implemented without the need to modify routing within the network. Which VPN technology must be used for this task?
questions.correct: C. GETVPN
questions.explanation: GETVPN encrypts unicast/multicast without changing routing.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. VPN tunnels between a spoke and two DMVPN hubs are not coming up. The network administrator has verified that the encryption, hashing, and DH group proposals for Phase 1 and Phase 2 match on both ends. What is the solution to this issue?
options: B. Increase the isakmp phase 1 lifetime.
C. Add NAT statements for VPN traffic.
questions.correct: A. Ensure bidirectional UDP 500/4500 traffic.
questions.explanation: Unidirectional UDP traffic prevents tunnel establishment.

questions.text: A router is being configured for IKEv2 AnyConnect using AnyConnect-EAP. How would the administrator separate profiles for administrators and employees so that authorization differs when they connect?
options: A. Define group aliases on the headend and have the user pick the appropriate alias when they connect
B. Define group-urls on the headend and create two XML profiles to match the administrator and user group urls
C. Create a certificate map and match on the appropriate certificate fields
D. Define key-ids on the headend and create two XML profiles to match the administrator and user key-ids.
questions.correct: B. Define group-urls on the headend and create two XML profiles to match the administrator and user group urls
questions.explanation: Group-URLs with separate XML profiles allow different authorizations.

questions.text: What is a characteristic of GETVPN?
options: A. An ACL that defines interesting traffic must be configured and applied to the crypto map.
B. Quick mode is used to create an IPsec SA.
C. The remote peer for the IPsec session is configured as part of the crypto map.
D. All peers have one IPsec SPI for inbound and outbound communication.
questions.correct: D. All peers have one IPsec SPI for inbound and outbound communication.
questions.explanation: GETVPN uses group SA with shared SPI for all members.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Users cannot connect via AnyConnect SSLVPN. Which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Configure the ASA to act as a DHCP server.
B. Configure the HTTP server to listen on port 443.
C. Add an IPsec preshared key to the group policy.
D. Add ssl-client to the allowed list of VPN protocols.
questions.correct: D. Add ssl-client to the allowed list of VPN protocols.
questions.explanation: Enable ssl-client protocol for AnyConnect SSLVPN.

questions.text: An administrator must guarantee that remote access users are able to reach printers on their local LAN after a VPN session is established to the headquarters. All other traffic should be sent over the tunnel. Which split-tunnel policy reduces the configuration on the ASA headend?
questions.correct: B. exclude specified
questions.explanation: Exclude local LAN to allow printing while tunneling all else. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/asa-5500-x-series-next-generation-firewalls/70847-local-lan-pix-asa.html

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. Given the output of the show ip route command, which remote access VPN technology is in use?
questions.correct: A. Reverse Route Injection
questions.explanation: The output indicates RRI for remote VPN routes.

questions.text: A network engineer is installing Cisco AnyConnect on company laptops so that users can access corporate resources remotely. The VPN concentrator is a Cisco router running IOS-XE 16.9.1 code and configured as a FlexVPN server that uses local authentication and *$Cisc431089017$* as the key-id for the IKEv2 profile. Which two steps must be taken on the computer to allow a successful AnyConnect connection to the router? (Choose two.)
options: A. In the Cisco AnyConnect XML profile, set the IPsec Authentication method to EAP-AnyConnect.
B. In the Cisco AnyConnect XML profile, add the hostname and host address to the server list.
C. In the Cisco AnyConnect XML profile, set the user group field to DefaultAnyConnectClientGroup.
D. In the Cisco AnyConnect Local Policy, set the BypassDownloader option in the local to true.
E. In the Cisco AnyConnect Local Policy, add the router IP address to the Update Policy.
questions.correct: A. In the Cisco AnyConnect XML profile, set the IPsec Authentication method to EAP-AnyConnect., D. In the Cisco AnyConnect Local Policy, set the BypassDownloader option in the local to true.
questions.explanation: EAP-AnyConnect for authentication and bypass downloader for local auth.

questions.text: A network engineer is setting up Cisco AnyConnect 4.9 on a Cisco ASA running ASA software 9.1. Cisco AnyConnect must connect to the Cisco ASA before the user logs on so that login scripts can work successfully. In addition, the VPN must connect without user intervention. Which two key steps accomplish this task? (Choose two.)
options: A. Create a Network Access Manager profile with a client policy set to connect before user logon.
B. Create a Cisco AnyConnect VPN profile with Start Before Logon set to true.
C. Issue an identity certificate to the trusted root CA folder in the machine store.
D. Create a Cisco AnyConnect VPN profile with Always On set to true.
E. Create a Cisco Anyconnect VPN Management Tunnel profile.
questions.correct: B. Create a Cisco AnyConnect VPN profile with Start Before Logon set to true., C. Issue an identity certificate to the trusted root CA folder in the machine store.
questions.explanation: SBL enables connection before logon with certificate trust.

questions.text: A network administrator has almost finished setting up a clientless VPN that allows remote users to access internal HTTP servers. Users must enter their username and password twice: once on the clientless VPN web portal and again to log in to internal HTTP servers. The Cisco ASA and the HTTP servers use the same Active Directory server to authenticate users. Which next step must be taken to allow users to enter their password only once?
options: A. Use LDAPS and add password management to the clientless tunnel group.
B. Configure auto-sign-on using NTLM authentication.
C. Set up the Cisco ASA to authenticate users via a SAML 2.0 IDP.
D. Create smart tunnels for the HTTP servers.
questions.correct: B. Configure auto-sign-on using NTLM authentication.
questions.explanation: NTLM auto-sign-on uses AD credentials for SSO. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/webvpn-ssl-vpn/119417-config-asa-00.html#anc17

questions.text: What must be configured in a FlexVPN deployment to allow for direct communication between spokes connected to different hubs?
options: A. EIGRP must be used as routing protocol.
B. Hub routers must be on same Layer 2 network.
C. Load balancing must be disabled.
D. A GRE tunnel must exist between hub routers.
questions.correct: D. A GRE tunnel must exist between hub routers.
questions.explanation: Direct spoke-to-spoke communication across different hubs in FlexVPN requires a GRE tunnel between hubs to facilitate routing. Reference: http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios/12_2/interface/configuration/guide/finter_c/icflogin.html#wp1031768

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer has configured a spoke to connect to a FlexVPN hub. The tunnel is up, but pings fail when the engineer attempts to reach host 192.168.200.10 behind the spoke, and traffic is sourced from host 192.168.100.3, which is behind the FlexVPN server. Based on packet captures, the engineer discovers that host 192.168.200.10 receives the icmp echo and sends an icmp reply that makes it to the inside interface of the spoke. Based on the output in the exhibit captured on the spoke by the engineer, which action resolves this issue?
options: A. Add the aaa authorization group cert list default default command to the spoke ikev2 profile.
B. Add the route set remote ipv4 192.168.200.0 255.255.255.0 command to the hub authorization policy.
C. Add the aaa authorization group cert list default default command to the hub ikev2 profile.
D. Add the route set remote ipv4 192.168.100.0 255.255.255.0 command to the spoke authorization policy.
questions.correct: D. Add the route set remote ipv4 192.168.100.0 255.255.255.0 command to the spoke authorization policy.
questions.explanation: The spoke needs to inject the route for the hub's network (192.168.100.0/24) into its routing table via the IKEv2 authorization policy to ensure return traffic reaches the hub.

questions.text: Which DMVPN feature allows spokes to be deployed with dynamically assigned public IP addresses?
questions.correct: B. NHRP
questions.explanation: NHRP (Next Hop Resolution Protocol) enables DMVPN spokes to register their dynamic public IP addresses with the hub, facilitating dynamic tunnel establishment.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is building an IKEv1 tunnel to a peer Cisco ASA, but the tunnel is failing. Based on the configuration in the exhibit, which action must be taken to allow the VPN tunnel to come up?
options: A. Add a route for the 10.7.7.0/24 network to egress the outside interface.
B. Enable IKEv1 on the outside interface.
C. Change the IKEv1 policy number to be at least 256.
D. Change the transform set mode to transport.
questions.correct: B. Enable IKEv1 on the outside interface.
questions.explanation: IKEv1 must be explicitly enabled on the ASA's outside interface for the tunnel to establish. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/ipsec-negotiation-ike-protocols/119425-configure-ipsec-00.html

questions.text: An engineer has successfully established a Phase 1 and Phase 2 tunnel between two sites. Site A has internal subnet 192.168.0.0/24 and Site B has internal subnet 10.0.0.0/24. The engineer notices that no packets are decrypted at Site B. Pings to 192.168.0.1 from internal Site B devices make it to the Site B router, and the Site A router has incrementing encrypt and decrypt counters. What must be done to ensure bidirectional communication between both sites?
options: A. Modify the routing at Site B so that traffic is sent to Site A.
B. Configure the correct DH group on both devices.
C. Allow protocol ESP or AH on the firewall in front of the Site B router.
D. Enable PFS on the headend device.
questions.correct: C. Allow protocol ESP or AH on the firewall in front of the Site B router.
questions.explanation: No decryption at Site B with incrementing counters at Site A suggests the firewall is blocking ESP/AH return traffic.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. A Cisco ASA is configured as a client to a router running as a FlexVPN server. The router is configured with a virtual template to terminate FlexVPN clients. Traffic between networks 192.168.0.0/24 and 172.16.20.0/24 does not work as expected. Based on the show crypto ikev2 sa output collected from the Cisco ASA in the exhibit, what is the solution to this issue?
options: A. Modify the crypto ACL on the router to permit network 192.168.0.0/24 to network 172.16.20.0/24.
B. Modify the crypto ACL on the ASA to permit network 192.168.0.0/24 to network 172.16.20.0/24.
C. Modify the crypto ACL on the ASA to permit network 172.16.20.0/24 to network 192.168.0.0/24.
D. Modify the crypto ACL on the router to permit network 172.16.20.0/24 to network 192.168.0.0/24.
questions.correct: B. Modify the crypto ACL on the ASA to permit network 192.168.0.0/24 to network 172.16.20.0/24.
questions.explanation: The show crypto ikev2 sa output shows a mismatch where the ASA's local selector is 192.168.0.0/24 to remote 172.16.2.0/24 instead of 172.16.20.0/24; correct the ASA's ACL.

questions.text: A user is trying to log in to a Cisco ASA using the clientless SSLVPN feature and receives the error message "clientless (browser) SSLVPN access is not allowed". Which step should the Cisco ASA administrator take to resolve this issue?
options: A. Enable the clientless VPN protocol on the group policy.
B. Validate that the correct license is in use on the ASA for WebVPN.
C. Increase the number of simultaneous logins allowed on the group policy.
D. Verify that a user account exists in the local AAA database for the user.
questions.correct: B. Validate that the correct license is in use on the ASA for WebVPN.
questions.explanation: The error indicates a licensing issue for clientless SSL VPN; validate the WebVPN license. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/webvpn-ssl-vpn/119417-config-asa-00.html#anc12

questions.text: Which feature allows a DMVPN Phase 3 spoke to switch to an alternate hub when the primary hub is unreachable?
questions.correct: B. backup NHS
questions.explanation: Backup NHS enables failover to an alternate hub in DMVPN Phase 3 if the primary is unreachable.

questions.text: An engineer is using DMVPN to provide secure connectivity between a data center and remote sites. Which two routing protocols should be used between the routers? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: B. BGP, E. EIGRP
questions.explanation: BGP and EIGRP are recommended for DMVPN due to their scalability and support for dynamic routing in hub-and-spoke or spoke-to-spoke topologies.

questions.text: Which remote access VPN technology requires the use of the IPsec-proposal configuration option?
questions.correct: C. IKEv2-based VPN
questions.explanation: IKEv2-based VPNs, such as FlexVPN, require an IPsec proposal to define encryption and authentication parameters. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa96/configuration/vpn/asa-96-vpn-config/vpn-remote-access.html

questions.text: Over the weekend, an administrator upgraded the Cisco ASA image on the firewalls and noticed that users cannot connect to the headquarters site using Cisco AnyConnect. What is the solution for this issue?
options: A. Upgrade the Cisco AnyConnect client version to be compatible with the Cisco ASA software image.
B. Upgrade the Cisco AnyConnect Network Access module to be compatible with the Cisco ASA software image.
C. Upgrade the Cisco AnyConnect client driver to be compatible with the Cisco ASA software image.
D. Upgrade the Cisco AnyConnect Start Before Logon module to be compatible with the Cisco ASA software image.
questions.correct: A. Upgrade the Cisco AnyConnect client version to be compatible with the Cisco ASA software image.
questions.explanation: ASA image upgrades may require a compatible AnyConnect client version to ensure connectivity. Incompatibility causes connection failures.

questions.text: Which two components are required in a Cisco IOS GETVPN key server configuration? (Choose two.)
questions.correct: A. RSA key, B. IKE policy
questions.explanation: GETVPN key server requires an RSA key for authentication and an IKE policy for secure key distribution.

questions.text: Refer to the exhibit. The network administrator must allow the Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client to securely access the corporate resources via IKEv2 and print locally. Traffic that is destined for the Internet must still be tunneled to the Cisco ASA. Which configuration does the administrator use to accomplish this goal?
options: A. Split exclude policy with a deny for 192.168.0.3/32.
B. Split exclude policy with a permit for 0.0.0.0/32.
D. Split include policy with a permit for 192.168.0.0/24.
questions.correct: B. Split exclude policy with a permit for 0.0.0.0/32.
questions.explanation: Split exclude with 0.0.0.0/32 allows local printing while tunneling Internet traffic to ASA. Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/asa-5500-x-series-next-generation-firewalls/70847-local-lan-pix-asa.html

questions.text: An organization wants to distribute remote access VPN load across 12 VPN headend locations supporting 25,000 simultaneous users. Which load balancing method meets this requirement?
options: A. one VPN profile per site
D. equal cost, multipath load balancing
questions.correct: B. DNS-based load balancing
